body:
Comment 1: 
if you want this, you could write a wrapper script around the Go tool, but
as this feature will introduce serious inconsistencies into the Go tool, i'm
afraid we can't do that.

note: "go run" is really just for one off script-style programs, and any
serious use of Go should use "go build/install/test".
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
